unnormalised: Konnen tori maka bud'dhi vibhagachea kaideam vixim vicharlem? Thik asa, kemar kasun ghe, kiteak hem vostu Dil'li unhallea porosui sukhem assa, punn tori astana, tumchea matyechea bhurgeank rakhunk zai, khorem na? Mhunnge, sadharanponnacher, tum kitem tori ekdom novein sodun kaddtta – ek Bollywood-achi kannyechim mandavoll ji uzunnhalli bhau-bhoinicher nasat – tum taka IP-chem nishan lavunk zai vegim. Ami uloitat gadgets khatir patents, gitam khatir copyrights (chint "chaiyya chaiyya" ani tanche zaite remix), brands khatir trademarks (ji "Haldiram's" – konnak tori avathadd dusreak "Haldipuram's" bhujia vikunk divop zaina!), ani vapari gupt utpadanam khatir, borem, gupt vostum khatir. Kalpna kara tea borem butter chicken-achi resepi. Tumi Sharmaji-chea aplea ghara lagicho tem chortolo mhunn tumi sodtave?

Atam, hanga bhonvddavp yeta. Vo, tumi zannata, vakilachea utrant “bhonvddavp” mhunn. Tum ek svatah-ghollpo chai-cho kop sodhun kaddta mhunn chinta. Te chokrea patent kara! Punn savdhan ravat, patent pass korunk Diwalli vellar confirm train-achi ticket mellovnche porosui kathinn asa. Ani tum ek pustak boroita “Harry Potter ani the Dosa of Doom,” J.K. Rowling-che vakil tumcher denvtat vegim tum "Wingardium Leviosa!" mhunnche porosui. Mhunnge, novein kori, punn *zaitinch* novein kori naka, tumchea jivit courtan saronk zai asta mhunn lagun, jem, vishvas divop sarkem, kaim vakilak favta. Case no. IP/2023/456 courtachea bhair sodvun aila, devak dhinva.

Mhunnge, ho, IP kaido. Tem ek khorech khas night-club-achi ideachi bouncer-a sarkhem asa. Tum tankam dakounk zai ki tum thik asa, novein asa, ani konnachich kalpanik shakticho chorun bhitor sortolo na mhunn. Tum kitem tori voddlechim chintun assa zalear, ek Adv-ak zolli bhovndi. Tumachi “krantikarak” novi scooter design ugtavche adim (patent file kelo 1/4/2024, asa mhunn aas korta). Na zalear, tum ek voddle lawsuit-acher mukhel zatat Mount Everest porosui ani ek jha, jem Mukesh Ambani-kui gham poddavnchota. Bori dissa, ani tumchea idea rakhlele asat mhunn divo!

normalised: Maka konnem bud'dhi sampatti kaidea vixim vicharlem? Thik asa, kamarak kas bandhat, kiteak hem vostu Delhi-chea unneachea datle vori sukhem asa, punn hey, te bud'di bhurgeank rakhunk zai, sori? Tech porim, tumi eka dempo original vostu gheun yeta- zaitech Bollywood-ache kathanak je lamb-lost twin ghet na- tumi taka ek I-P label A-S-A-P lagounk zai. Ami gadgetsachea patents vixim ulaitat, gitamkhatir copyrights ("chaiyya chaiyya" ani tachea zaitench remix gheta) brands khatir trademarks ("Haldiram's" porim- konnem "Haldipuram's" bhujia vikunk favona!), ani dhandeachea gupit vostunkhatir, bore, gupit vostunkhatir. Tea uttam butter chicken-achea recipechi kalpna korat. Tumcher tea Sharmaji-n tenka chorunk favona, zaite?

Atam, hanga tumkam mojachi lagta. Va, tumchea zannva प्रमाणे "moj" vakilachea arthant. Manun geat tumi eka self-stirring chai cup-acho sodh laitat. Tea sucker-ak patent diyat! Punn savadhan, patent-ak manyata mellounk Diwali-chea vellar confirmed train ticket mellouche vori sakhech asat. Ani tumi zann Harry Potter and the Dosa of Doom nanvache pustak boraitat, J.K. Rowling-chea vakil tumcher "Wingardium Leviosa!" ucharchek fattim podte. Tech khatir creative zaat, punn zaito creative zaunk naka, tumi court-an tumchen jivit vengche vori astaat, je ironic प्रमाणे kaim vakilak lagta. Case number I-P slash don hazar ani teis slash charxim ani panchaksett court-an chukto zalo, devak dhanyavad.

Tech khatir, ho I-P kaido. Ho vicharankhatir aslolea khub exclusive nightclub-achea bouncers vori asat. Tumcheam legit, original ani konnachea dusreachem creative bhitor rigounk try kortat mhonn dakounk zai. Tumi kosle tori vhoddle vixim vichar kortat zalear Advocate-a sangata veginuch uloyat. Tumchem "revolutionary" scooter design launch korche adim (patent ek April don hazar ani chovis-ak file kelem, asha asa). Natar tumi Mount Everest-achea vhoddle case-ak samore zaunche ani fine ji Mukesh Ambani-akuy dainyan bhair kadtolem. Bhagevant zaat, ani tumche vichar rakhle vochot!
